name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: [SOUND].

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: This lecture is about link analysis for web search.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _In this lecture we're going to talk about web search

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: focusing on how to do link analysis and use the results to improve search.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: The main topic of this lecture is to look at the ranking algorithms for web search.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _In the previous lecture
column6: we talked about how to create index. _

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _Now that we have got index
column6: we want to see how we can improve _

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: ranking of pages on the web.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _Standard IR models can also be applied here

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _in fact they are important building blocks for supporting web search

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _but they aren't sufficient

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _First
column6: on the web we tend to have very different information needs. _

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _For example
column6: people might search for a web page or entry page

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: this is different from the traditional library search

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: where people are primarily interested in collecting literature information.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _So these kind of queries are often called navigational queries

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: the purpose is to navigate into a particular targeted page.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _So for such queries
column6: we might benefit from using link information. _

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _Secondly

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _And on the web

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _There are a lot of other groups

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _such as the layout

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: So this has provided an opportunity to

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: use extra context information of the document to improve scoring.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _And finally

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: So that means we have to consider many factors to improve the ranking algorithm.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: This would give us a more robust way to rank the pages making it the harder for

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: any spammer to just manipulate the one signal to improve the ranking of a page.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: So as a result people have made a number of major extensions

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: to the ranking algorithms.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: One line is to exploit links to

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: improve scoring and that's the main topic of this lecture.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: People have also proposed algorithms to exploit large scale

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: implicit feedback information in the form of clickthroughs.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _That's of course in the category of feedback techniques

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: machinery is often used there.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _In general
column6: in web search the ranking algorithms are based on machinery _

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: algorithms to combine all kinds of features.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: And many of them are based on the standard original models such as BM25 that

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _we talked about

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: queried iCode to score different parts of documents or

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _to
column6: provide additional features based on content matching. _

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: But link information is also very useful so

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: they provide additional scoring signals.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: So let's look at links in more detail on the web.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _So this is a snapshot of some part of the web

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: So we can see there are many links that link different pages together.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _And in this case you can also look at the

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: There is a description of a link that's pointing to the document on

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: the right side.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: Now this description text is called anchor text.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _If you think about this text

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: because it provides some extra description of that page being pointed to.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _So
column7: if someone wants to bookmark Amazon.com front page

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _the person might say

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _then with a link to Amazon

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: So the description here is actually very similar to what the user would type in

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: in the query box when they are looking for such a page.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _That's why it's very useful for

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: Suppose someone types in a query like online bookstore or

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _big online bookstore

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: The query would match this anchor text in the page here.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: And then this actually provides evidence for

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _matching the page that's been pointed to
column6: that is the Amazon entry page. _

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _So if you match the anchor text that describes the link to a page

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: actually that provides good evidence for

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: the relevance of the page being pointing to.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: So anchor text is very useful.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _If you look at the bottom part of this picture
column6: you can also see there are some _

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _patterns of links
column6: and these links might indicate the utility of a document. _

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _So for example

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _on the right side you can see this page has received many in

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: That means many other pages are pointing to this page.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: And this shows that this page is quite useful.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _On the left side you can see
column6: this is a page that points to many other pages. _

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _So
column6: this is a theater page that would allow you to _

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: actually see a lot of other pages.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: So we can call the first case authority page and the second case a hub page.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: This means the link information can help in two ways.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: One is to provide extra text for matching.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: The other is to provide some additional scores for the web

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _pages to characterize how likely a page is a hub
column6: how likely a page is a authority. _

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _So people then

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _Google's PageRank

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _which was a main technique that they used in early days

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _And that
column6: that is the algorithm to capture page popularity

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: basically to score authority.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _So the intuitions here are
column6: links are just like citations in the literature. _

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: Think about one page pointing to another page.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: This is very similar to one paper citing another paper.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _So
column7: then if a page is cited often

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _then we can assume this page to be more useful in general

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: So that's a very good intuition.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _Now
column6: page rank is essentially to take advantage of this _

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _intuition to implement the

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: Intuitively it's essentially doing citation counting or in link counting.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _It just improves this simple idea in

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: One is would consider indirect citations.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _So that means you don't just look at the how many in links you have

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: you also look at the what are those pages that are pointing to you.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _If those pages
column7: have a lot of in links

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: In some sense you will get some credit from that.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: But if those pages that are pointing to you are not are being pointed to

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _by other pages
column6: they themselves don't have many in links

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: you don't get that much credit.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: So that's the idea of getting indirect citation.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _Right
column6: so you can also understand this idea by looking at

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: the research papers.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _If you are cited by

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _workshop papers and that
column6: or some papers that are not very influential

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _so although you got ten in links
column6: that's not as good as if you have

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: you're cited by ten papers that themselves have attracted a lot of other citations.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: So this is a case where

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: we would like to consider indirect links and PageRank does that.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _The other idea is
column6: it's good to smooth the citations. _

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _Or
column7: or assume that basically every page is _

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: having a non-zero pseudo citation count.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _Essentially
column6: you are trying to imagine there are many virtual links that _

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _will link all the pages together so that you

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: you actually get pseudo citations from everyone.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _The
column6: the reason why they want to do that is this would allow them _

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: to solve the problem elegantly with linear algebra technique.

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: So I think maybe the best way to understand the page

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _rank is through think of this as through computer

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: _the probability of a random surfer

name: 5 - 3 - 4.3 Link Analysis - Part 1 (00-09-16).srt
text: [MUSIC]
